In this tutorial we will show you, how to use Android ScrollView component and create a simple example using various ScrollView properties. Most Android application will likely to have the contents thats fit the screen. Think a bit about displaying the news details, the contents are dynamic and can grow beyond your screen size. If we design our screen layout using standard layout managers like LinearLayout, RelativeLayout, FrameLayout or TableLayout when the content grows, and data goes beyond screen size, and user wont be able scroll and view the content
